Nome: Paula Mara Ribeiro

Exemplo 1
MT:
1110010111011011101001011011101101001011110111011110100101111101110111110100110110111011010011011101110111010011011111011101111101000111011111

Resultado:
Aprovada


Exemplo 2
MT:
111001011101101110100101101110110100101111011101111010010111110111011111010011011011101101001101110111011101001101111101110111110100011101111

Resultado:
Rejeitada


Exemplo 3
MT:
110010111011011101001011110110111101001101110101111011001101111010111011000111101111011101111

Resultado:
Rejeitada -> entrou em loop


Exemplo 4
MT:
110010111011011101001011110101111010011011101011110110011011110101110110001111011110111

Resultado:
Aprovada
